recipes.title: Pecan Squares
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a small bowl, cream butter and confectioners' sugar. Gradually add flour, mixing until blended. Pat into an ungreased 9-in. square baking pan. Bake at 350° for 20-22 minutes or until golden.                                                                                           In another small bowl, beat the eggs, brown sugar, corn syrup and salt until smooth. Pour over crust; sprinkle with pecans. Bake 40-45 minutes longer or until set. Cool on a wire rack. Cut into bars.                                        Yield: 20 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Pecan Pie Bars in  Country ExtraNovember  2002, p51                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 each) equals 175 calories, 9 g fat (3 g saturated fat), 44 mg cholesterol, 81 mg sodium, 24 g carbohydrate, 1 g fiber, 2 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a small bowl, cream butter and confectioners' sugar. Gradually add flour, mixing until blended. Pat into an ungreased 9-in. square baking pan.
Bake at 350° for 20-22 minutes or until golden.
In another small bowl, beat the eggs, brown sugar, corn syrup and salt until smooth.
Pour over crust; sprinkle with pecans.
Bake 40-45 minutes longer or until set. Cool on a wire rack.
